name: Luminous
description:
This is a character mod of Luminous, the hero who comes from Maple World. 
 Enjoy the Light and Dark, and powerful Balance Cards! 


 Thank you for playing this mod, if you have any feedback or bug reports, please comment on the Steam! 
 感谢游玩此mod，如果你有任何想法或发现了bug，请在Steam上留言告诉我~
